mapper.sql: activity_id, activity_name, activity_code, start_time, end_time, create_time, modify_time, create_man, modify_man, remark
mapper.insert: insert into activity (activity_id, activity_name, activity_code, start_time, end_time, create_time, modify_time, create_man, modify_man, remark) values (#{activityId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{activityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{activityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{modifyMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})

insert into activity
activity_id,
activity_name,
activity_code,
start_time,
end_time,
create_time,
modify_time,
create_man,
modify_man,
remark,
#{activityId,jdbcType=BIGINT},
#{activityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{activityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
#{createMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{modifyMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
#{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
mapper.update:
update activity
activity_name = #{activityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
activity_code = #{activityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
create_man = #{createMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
modify_man = #{modifyMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
where activity_id = #{activityId,jdbcType=BIGINT}

update activity set activity_name = #{activityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, activity_code = #{activityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, start_time = #{startTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, modify_time = #{modifyTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_man = #{createMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, modify_man = #{modifyMan,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, remark = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where activity_id = #{activityId,jdbcType=BIGINT}
mapper.select: select a.activity_id as activityId, a.activity_name as activityName, DATE_FORMAT(a.start_time,"%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s") as startTimeStr, DATE_FORMAT(a.end_time,"%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s") as endTimeStr from activity a where a.activity_code=#{activityCode,jdbcType=VARCHAR} limit 1
